chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 has the above problem:
The speaker at the top doesn't work properly and distorts sounds. The microphone below makes noise for callers with whom I communicate.
Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to resolve the issue and we do not have sufficient stock for replacement. Instead, we have refunded the customer.

Regards,
JH
